## isTypeContainer() function

Type guard function that determines whether a ParameterType is a TypeContainer or a plain string type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
isTypeContainer: (parameterType: ParameterType) => parameterType is TypeContainer
```

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

parameterType


</td><td>

[ParameterType](./case-plugin-base.parametertype.md)


</td><td>

The parameter type to check


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

parameterType is [TypeContainer](./case-plugin-base.typecontainer.md)

true if the parameter is a TypeContainer, false if it's a string
